replies.message:
Dresden St. Just off 8 Mile
I was there Aug 22, 2014, before the monster your concert at Comerica Park. His house is gone, just a dirt yard surrounded by un-maintained yards, burnt down houses , garbage ect...

Started from the bottom for sure. 

Props Eminem
Thank you comment guy, I came in looking for the answer to wtf is 19946
When did it actually burn down? I know there was a fire that was stopped but then i saw pictures of the space where it once was
Some of u ppl need to get a life. Like u ppl know so many sad facts about eminem. Who gives a shit where he grew up or what it looks like now.

Sooo we don't have a life because we are fans of Eminems? Maybe YOU need to get a life since all you are doing is reading other people's comment then telling them they don't have a life when it's clear you are the one without one seeing as how you have to bash people for doing nothing wrong. 😘💁💯
Wow you people arguing on here are so fuckin stupid on so many levels. Go bury your heads in a hole. But especially Marc Guerin you can go kill yourself. You are not shit
Marc you fucking mong! True Eminem fans know every little detail about him. If you didn't know any of these facts then you aren't a true eminem fan!!
Knowing where someone started and ended up builds a respect level you clearly have no idea about marc ya cunt
